title: (x) On the hunt for this delicate & girly western slab - various suggestions {Mike Y}
content:
I've fallen in love with this typeface but cannot find it \*anywhere\*. I've never come across a bit of circus/western this delicate & girly. I don't believe this is handdrawn, but anything is possible! Any ideas on ID, hive mind?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [western slab.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205073154/http:/typophile.com/files/western%20slab.jpg) | 18.23 KB |
author: magpiephotoworks

comments.content:
Similar to [Prescott Plain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205073154/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/prescott/). A few added curves would make a close match to your sample.

- Mike Yanega

There's also [Steeplechase](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205073154/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/steeplechase/) from BA Graphics. Not exact, but close enough to start with.

- Mike Yanega
